TopicTitle: Mod that adds a mobile training station

Articles.Content:
Hey all i have a small question, i played modded ksp around a year ago and i used a mod that had a part that let you train kerbals in orbit or bases, however i lost that install and i forgot the name of the mod, so i wanted to ask what mods do have this kind of parts so i can probably find it again. 

Thanks for your help!

Depending on what you mean, the mobile lab may do what you want. It will level up Kerbals like returning them home would.

If you want to actually give then xp without sending them places then no I've never seen a mod that does that, though I'd not be surprised to find one exists.

Edited December 26, 2018 by 5thHorseman

I believe it's the station contract pack for Contract Configurator that offers a Space Camp contract.   Send up 15 or so tourists into orbit for 40 days, and upon return, 3 of them will join your program, once each discipline, but they will also have 5 extra XP given to them, so they can reach level 3 without ever leaving Kerbins SOI.    Not exactly what you are looking for, but it makes for a cool little gameplay mechanic.

18 hours ago, Gargamel said:

I believe it's the station contract pack for Contract Configurator that offers a Space Camp contract.   Send up 15 or so tourists into orbit for 40 days, and upon return, 3 of them will join your program, once each discipline, but they will also have 5 extra XP given to them, so they can reach level 3 without ever leaving Kerbins SOI.    Not exactly what you are looking for, but it makes for a cool little gameplay mechanic. 

 

On 12/26/2018 at 1:55 PM, 5thHorseman said:

Depending on what you mean, the mobile lab may do what you want. It will level up Kerbals like returning them home would.

If you want to actually give then xp without sending them places then no I've never seen a mod that does that, though I'd not be surprised to find one exists.

I think you two are right that must be what i saw.
